title: The Silent Men and The FBI In Peace And War
description: Case Closed begins with The Silent Men this week. We'll hear Little White Lies, their broadcast from January 13, 1952. (30:05) We close this episode with The FBI In Peace And War, with their story Unfinished Business. Case Closed begins with The Silent Men this week. We’ll hear Little White Lies, their broadcast from January 13, 1952.

(30:05) We close this episode with The FBI In Peace And War, with their story Unfinished Business. That episode originally aired August 2, 1951.
